title: Topic 001 Question 027
body: A SysOps administrator is using AWS CloudFormation StackSets to create AWS resources in two AWS Regions in the same AWS account. A stack operation fails in one Region and returns the stack instance status of OUTDATED.
What is the cause of this failure?
options: The CloudFormation template changed on the local disk and has not been submitted to CloudFormation.
The CloudFormation template is trying to create a global resource that is not unique.
The stack has not yet been deployed to the Region.
The SysOps administrator is using an old version of the CloudFormation API.
